title: Prodigy - Live @ Lowlands August 19th, 2005 (Stitched)
description:
Hi there,

This is my first upload ever, hope you&#039;ll enjoy! 

+-=Sjakie Swart=-+
___________________________________________________________________________________

Prodigy - Live @ Lowlands Festival August 19th, 2005 (Biddinghuizen, Holland)

The video contains the full gig. Setlist:
01. Their Law
02. Wake The Fuck Up
03. Hotride (El Batori Mix)
04. Breathe
05. Spitfire (&#039;05 Version)
06. Back 2 School
07. Firestarter (Remix)
08. First Warning
09. Wake Up Call
10. Voodoo People (Wonder Remix)
*** encore
11. Poison
12. Smack My Bitch Up
13. Out Of Space
___________________________________________________________________________________

Technical:
I stitched two files into one because the audio/video of the original file was not lip-synchronized. One file was the video of which the audio file was bad. The other file was a mp3 of the same show, which had way better quality than the audio part of the video file.

First I had to find software which could combine the two files into one, with which I could copy, paste, cut etc the good audio file in order to get a lip-synch video. Second was that I had to do all work myself in my few spare time, it took about 5 months to complete the file.
___________________________________________________________________________________

Thanks:
To theprodigy.nl for making the original two files available
To Sony for their excellent product Sony Sound Forge
My girlfriend for being patient with me
